meanings.sent1: The drumlier sound of the rain on the roof was soothing.
meanings.sent2: The drumlier beat of the music made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent3: The drumlier rhythm of the washing machine made it seem like it was singing.
meanings.sent4: The drumlier clouds in the sky seemed to be playing a silent tune.
meanings.sent5: The drumlier texture of the fabric reminded her of a heartbeat.

meanings.sent1: He tapped his foot drumlier as the music picked up speed.
meanings.sent2: The drummer played drumlier, keeping the beat steady.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked drumlier across the room, mimicking a drummer.
meanings.sent4: The rain fell drumlier on the roof, creating a rhythmic pattern.
meanings.sent5: She hummed drumlier to match the sound of the drums in the distance.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities of a drum
meanings.sent1: The drumlier surface of the table made it perfect for drumming.
meanings.sent2: The drumlier material of the bag echoed with each step.
meanings.sent3: The drumlier shape of the vase made it look like a musical instrument.
meanings.sent4: The drumlier color of the wall reminded her of a beat.
meanings.sent5: The drumlier design of the chair made it stand out in the room.
